'''Radiant Spincrystal 22''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Eternal Anamnesis (Genshin Impact Main Theme Var.)|Eternal Anamnesis]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]].
